message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. While I'm interested, $14,000 is a bit out of my range.  I'd be willing to pay $13,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $14,000 is the lowest I'm willing to go right now. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be well worth the investment. What would you say to meeting in the middle at $13,500?
